LanguageData.CrE_PiratePawn_Extort: {2} has grown wary of your recent complacency and now demands a tribute in labor. They insist that {1} be sent to serve under their banner for some time, fulfilling their needs and demonstrating your submissiveness. They give you 1 day. Failure to comply will be met with aggression.
LanguageData.CrE_AcceptedPiratePawn_Extort: Laughter ensues from hearing that. The pirates promise to use {0}, however does not say anything about returning {0} unharmed.
LanguageData.CrE_RejectedPiratePawn_Extort: Clearly the pirates at {1} will not have this.
